entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:14 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 04:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon then becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
